376440.name: ACID Music Studio 10 - Steam Powered - Loop Content
376440.description:
ACID Music Studio Loop Content includes more than 1500 loops and samples in a wide variety of genres so you can get started making music right away. Pick the loops you like, paint them into ACID Music Studio, and get great results fast — even if you're a newcomer to the world of computer music.

Includes:


Loops & Songs

Chose from 1.645 loops and samples. Content: Basses, Drums, Guitars, Keys, Percussion, Strings, Synthesizers, Turntables, Vocals, Winds and FX.



Soundsets & Songs

More than 120 prebuild songs and files from various genres. Content: Cinematic Groove, Dance, Electronica, Hip-Hop, Minimal Bubbles, Rock and DLS Instruments.
376440.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
